item.title: red flags writeup
item.description: Challenge description link to challange : red flags (34 solves) The challenge is simple game made in godot engine with a goal to touch flags in correct order - when you touch each flag letters move in some directions. We can see bait flag here ;) Solution I started by extracting the game files (project) with Godot RE Tools and then opened it in godot engine. Then we can see game source code, also we can debug and change it.
